title: Why I think Blockchain and Quantum can transform technological revolution
author: Gharsa Amin
content:
Blockchain and Quantum technologies are transforming the future of computing. These innovations are poised to revolutionize data security, processing speeds, and efficiency.

In the coming years, we might see more applications of these technologies in real-world scenarios, from secure data transactions to more powerful computing systems.

title: How did React help me get started on Front-end, back-end, and Databases
author: Gharsa Amin
